title: Chat Bugged?
body:
In the new Alpha Client that we're supposed to be testing, I've noticed that the chat on friends list is bugged, previous messages aren't showing up until you relog, but then whenever you click somewhere else, it goes away. I don't know if this is intentional or a bug, but I just thought I'd report it.
Other than that, everything that's available works fine so far. Although, my friends have told me that it just keeps saying that I'm in game even after I'm done with a game.

replies.body:
Yeah same I have my status as "champ select" after a game has finished. It also says I am in a lobby 1/5 when I am not. I already reported this as a bug.

http://i.imgur.com/d1JZvxf.png
Report bugs through the in client feature too. I had the in game thing as well.

I also made a friends group and when I went over to the legacy client it wasn't there, when I went back to the alpha client it had disappeared. 

On another note, will we be able to view clubs, or have our club tags shown in the alpha client?

Thanks for posting and thanks for helping out with the Alpha!

Did you also submit this feedback via the "Report a Bug" button on the client?  That is where we do most of our bug hunting and it is the best place to send in bug reports for analysis.

Cheers!
Mindstar

I've also noticed the new client has the same behaviour as the old in regards to your status - if you set it to away, it changes it back to online sometime later on when you move your mouse. If I set my status to Away, it should stay that way until I change it myself.
